text: Selviria is a genus of aphodiine dung beetles in the family Scarabaeidae. There are at least two described species in Selviria, both found in Brazil. Selviria matogrossoensis has been reported in a nest of fire ants. ==Species== These two species belong to the genus Selviria: * Selviria anneae Stebnicka, 2005 c g * Selviria matogrossoensis Stebnicka, 1999 c g Data sources: i = ITIS, c = Catalogue of Life, g = GBIF, b = Bugguide.net ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * Category:scarabaeiformia
title: Selviria (beetle)
